channel.title: PI Givestaff Command help
channel.description: hello i was wondering if any 1 here has givemod admin etc. for [pi] all the 1s it try get me parsing error:/ if u got please post

item.title: PI Givestaff Command help
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

ya here

obviously change it to your name instead if ravens

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givemod”) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ravens”))) {
try {
String giveDonor = playerCommand.substring(8);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(giveDonor)) {
Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage(“c.playerName made @blu@”+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+"@bla@ a @blu@mod@bla@.");
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ravens”))) {
try {
String giveDonor = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(giveDonor)) {
Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage(“c.playerName made “+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+” a @dre@Admin@bla@.”);
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}
}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveowner") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ravens"))) {
			try {
				String giveDonor = playerCommand.substring(10);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(giveDonor)) {
							Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 3;
							c.sendMessage("c.playerName made "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" a @dre@owner@bla@.");
						} 
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic
